text: Gilbert Meyer (26 December 1941 - 21 September 2020) was a French politician. He was a deputy in the National Assembly from 1993 to 2007. He was the Mayor of Colmar from 1995 to 4 July 2020. He was a member of the Rally for the Republic (RPR) and Union for a Popular Movement (UMP). Meyer was born in Dessenheim, France. Meyer died on 21 September 2020 from a stroke caused by glioblastoma in Colmar at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:People from Colmar Category:French mayors
title: Gilbert Meyer
